verses.verse: Therefore1223, 5124 we <WG2248> ought <WG1163> to give the more earnest <WG4056> heed <WG4337> to the things that were heard <WG191>, lest haply <WG3379> we drift away from them <WG3901>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> the word <WG3056> spoken <WG2980> through <WG1223> angels <WG32> proved <WG1096> stedfast <WG949>, and <WG2532> every <WG3956> transgression <WG3847> and <WG2532> disobedience <WG3876> received <WG2983> a <WG3405> just <WG1738> recompense of reward <WG3405>;

how <WG4459> shall <WG1628> we <WG2249> escape <WG1628>, if we <WG2249> neglect <WG272> so great <WG5082> a salvation <WG4991>? which <WG3748> having at <WG2983> the first <WG746> been spoken <WG2980> through <WG1223> the Lord <WG2962>, was confirmed <WG950> unto <WG1519> us <WG2248> by <WG5259> them that heard <WG191>;

God also <WG2316> bearing witness <WG4901> with them <WG5037>, both by signs <WG4592> and <WG2532> wonders <WG5059>, and <WG2532> by manifold <WG4164> powers <WG1411>, and <WG2532> by gifts <WG3311> of the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151>, according to <WG2596> his own <WG846> will <WG2308>.
For <WG1063> not <WG3756> unto angels <WG32> did he <WG5293> subject <WG5293> the world <WG3625> to come <WG3195>, whereof4012, 3739 we speak <WG2980>.

But <WG1161> one <WG5100> hath somewhere <WG4225> testified <WG1263>, saying <WG3004>, What <WG5101> is <WG2076> man <WG444>, that <WG3754> thou art mindful <WG3403> of him <WG846>? Or <WG2228> the son <WG5207> of man <WG444>, that <WG3754> thou visitest <WG1980> him <WG846>?

Thou madest <WG1642> him <WG846> a little1024, Acts0 lower <WG1642> than <WG3844> the angels <WG32>; Thou crownedst <WG4737> him <WG846> with glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> honor <WG5092>, And <WG2532> didst set <WG2525> him <WG846> over <WG1909> the works <WG2041> of thy <WG4675> hands <WG5495>:

Thou didst put <WG5293> all things <WG3956> in subjection <WG5293> under <WG5270> his <WG846> feet <WG4228>. For <WG1063> in <WG1722> that <WG3588> he subjected <WG5293> all <WG3956> things unto <WG5293> him <WG846>, he left <WG863> nothing <WG3762> that is not subject <WG506> to him <WG846>. But <WG1161> now <WG3568> we see <WG3708> not yet <WG3768> all things <WG3956> subjected <WG5293> to him <WG846>.

But <WG1161> we behold <WG991> him who <WG2424> hath been made <WG1642> a little1024, Acts0 lower <WG1642> than <WG3844> the angels <WG32>, even Jesus <WG1223>, because of the suffering <WG3804> of death <WG2288> crowned <WG4737> with glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> honor <WG5092>, that <WG3704> by the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> he <WG1089> should taste <WG1089> of death <WG2288> for <WG5228> every man <WG3956>.

For <WG1063> it became <WG4241> him <WG846>, for <WG1223> whom <WG3739> are all things <WG3956>, and <WG2532> through <WG1223> whom <WG3739> are all things <WG3956>, in bringing <WG71> many <WG4183> sons <WG5207> unto <WG1519> glory <WG1391>, to make <WG5048> the author <WG747> of <WG4991> their <WG846> salvation <WG4991> perfect <WG5048> through <WG1223> sufferings <WG3804>.

For <WG1063> both <WG5037> he that sanctifieth <WG37> and <WG2532> they that are sanctified <WG37> are all <WG3956> of <WG1537> one <WG1520>: for <WG1223> which <WG3739> cause <WG156> he is <WG1870> not <WG3756> ashamed <WG1870> to call <WG2564> them <WG846> brethren <WG80>,

saying <WG3004>, I will declare <WG518> thy <WG4675> name <WG3686> unto <WG80> my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, In <WG1722> the midst <WG3319> of the congregation <WG1577> will I sing thy <WG4571> praise <WG5214>.

And <WG2532> again <WG3825>, I <WG1473> will <WG2071> put my trust <WG3982> in <WG1909> him <WG846>. And <WG2532> again <WG3825>, Behold <WG2400>, I <WG1473> and <WG2532> the children <WG3813> whom <WG3739> God <WG2316> hath given <WG1325> me <WG3427>.

Since <WG1893> then <WG3767> the <WG1893> children <WG3813> are sharers <WG2841> in flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> blood <WG129>, he <WG3348> also <WG2532> himself <WG846> in like manner <WG3898> partook <WG3348> of the same <WG846>; that <WG2443> through <WG1223> death <WG2288> he might bring to nought <WG2673> him that had <WG2192> the power <WG2904> of death <WG2288>, that <WG5124> is <WG2076>, the devil <WG1228>;

and <WG2532> might deliver <WG525> all them <WG5128> who <WG3745> through <WG1223> fear <WG5401> of death <WG2288> were <WG2258> all <WG3956> their lifetime <WG2198> subject <WG1777> to bondage <WG1397>.
For <WG1063> verily <WG1222> not <WG3756> to angels <WG32> doth he give <WG1949> help <WG1949>, but <WG235> he giveth <WG1949> help to the seed of <WG4690> Abraham <WG11>.

Wherefore <WG3606> it behooved <WG3784> him in <WG2596> all things <WG3956> to be made like <WG3666> unto <WG80> his brethren <WG80>, that <WG2443> he might become <WG1096> a merciful <WG1655> and <WG2532> faithful <WG4103> high priest <WG749> in things pertaining to <WG4314> God <WG2316>, to <WG1519> make propitiation for <WG2433> the sins <WG266> of the people <WG2992>.
For <WG1063> in <WG1722> that <WG3739> he <WG3958> himself <WG846> hath suffered <WG3958> being tempted <WG3985>, he is able <WG1410> to succor <WG997> them that are tempted <WG3985>.
